name: Burgers (on the Grill)
steps: Carefully seperate Ground Beef into 6 equal chunks
Mix Onion, Cayenne, Pepper, Garlic Powder, and Garlic Salt together
Pour in Worcestershire Sauce and Chipotle Ranch
Mix together and pour over Beef chunks equally
Work mixture into Beef chunks briefly (avoid over-working the beef)
Form beefy chunks into patties, each 3/5"-tall and concave
Once hot, place patties on grill for 8 minutes on each side
Spread Butter on inside of buns
Place buns butter-down on grill until light/golden brown
When patties have 1 minute left, add cheese/bacon (if applicable)
Once burgers are done, dress accordingly with your desired toppings and serve
comments: Definitely add the toppings of your choice, this recipe is for the base meat/bun prep
Suggested Topping: Mayo, Lettuce, Extra Red Onion, Thick Bacon, and Jake's Beer Cheese
